item.title: **The FUEL Framework** Template
item.description: Facts Unfold Emotion Learning Sample I need my statup to make $5k per month to be sustainable. (This is the unfold / interesting and mysterious opening line) But after 3 years, it‚Äôs only at ~$1200 :sad emoji (FACTS) I could let that discourage me‚Ä¶ (EMOTION) Or I could remember that 3 months ago we were only at $500 Truth is we‚Äôre making good progress :emoji (LEARNINGS) Hopefully we reach our goal next year.

item.title: 1% growth and 1% decline image
item.description: This is an idea and image popularized by James Clear in Atomic habits It‚Äôs that crazy idea that as that it just takes 1% to see significant growth. You can see it mathematically- it‚Äôs very clear Read more at: Atomic Habits blog You may also be interested in: Small decisions actually make a huge impact.

item.title: 202111202048- The way of knowing not
item.description: topic: John of the Cross and Unending Depths alias: tags:#permanent-note,#john-of-the-cross#knowing ¬ß My writing (250-300 words) ¬ß In the ‚ÄúAscent of Mt Carmel,‚Äù John of the Cross writes: ‚ÄúTo come to the knowledge of all desire the knowledge of nothing *and * To come to the knowledge you have not you must go by a way in which you know not‚Äù To me- as someone who likes to study about faith and God, it‚Äôs a reminder that knowledge can only go so far.

item.title: 202111202049- Knowledge Never Ends
item.description: topic: John of the Cross and Unending Depths alias: tags:#permanent-note,#on/knowledge,#infinite ¬ß My writing (250-300 words) ¬ß Saint Augustine said, if you think you know it, then it‚Äôs not God.
